page.title: 06NEW INDUSTRIES 2
page.content: The two biggest factories are Bowater Scott's and British Cellophane. { Bowaters}employ 1400 people. They make tissue paper for kitchen towels and toilets rolls. They use wood-pulp from America. { British Cellophane}make transparent film for packaging. People living around the factory sometimes complain about the smell! { Camille Simon}make detergents for the "own-brand" washing powders, cleaners & soaps sold by many big supermarkets. { Ashley Accessories}have a factory in Ulverston too. They make{electrical plugs and sockets etc. { Sovereign Chemicals}make paints and other DIY & decorating products. Lots of shops have signs made by{ {Furness Plastics. { }
